text: Matchoi Bobó Djaló (born 10 April 2003) is a Bissau-Guinean professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Paços de Ferreira. ==Career== On 10 August 2019, Djaló made his debut for Paços de Ferreira, coming on as a 72nd- minute substitute for Pedrinho Moreira in a 5–0 loss away to reigning champions Benfica. At the age of 16 years and 122 days, he was the youngest player ever to play in the Primeira Liga. ==Personal life== Djaló is the son of the retired footballer Bobó Djalo. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="1"|Paços de Ferreira |2019–20 |Primeira Liga |2||0||0||0||0||0||0||0||2||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !2!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!2!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== *Profile at Liga Portuguesa de Futebol Profissional Category:Living people Category:2003 births Category:Bissau-Guinean footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:F.C.
